00128 
00129 int main(void)
00130 {
00131    wdtdrv_disable();
00132    Clear_prescaler();
00133    scheduler();
00134    return 0;
00135 }
00136 
00140 #ifdef  __GNUC__
00141 // Locate low level init function before RAM init (init3 section)
00142 // and remove std prologue/epilogue
00143 char __low_level_init(void) __attribute__ ((section (".init3"),naked));
00144 #endif
00145 
00146 #ifdef __cplusplus
00147 extern "C" {
00148 #endif
00149 char __low_level_init()
00150 {
00151   Clear_prescaler();
00152   return 1;
00153 }
00154 #ifdef __cplusplus
00155 }
00156 #endif
